explanation.rules:
Rules:
• Word order = 〈possessor〉 〈possessed〉.
• Prefixes on the possessor noun:
  1 sg n‑; 2 sg Ø‑; 3 sg h‑; ‘each of us’ t‑; ‘one’s own …’ d‑; 2 pl ri‑.
• Prefixes on the possessed noun = (consonant of possessor prefix) + vowel:
  ‑a‑ if the possessed item is a body‑part;
  ‑e‑ otherwise.
